algorithm_technique: Iterate through queries, update array, and maintain a running sum of even numbers efficiently.
problem_summary_simple: Update an array based on queries and return the sum of even numbers after each update.
problem_summary_technical: Maintains a running sum of even numbers. For each query, it adjusts the sum based on the parity of the element before and after the update.
key_insights: Instead of recalculating the sum of even numbers from scratch after each query, maintain a running total.
When an element `A[i]` is modified, check its parity before and after the modification. If it was even, subtract its old value from the total. If it becomes even, add its new value to the total.
This approach avoids iterating through the entire array for each query, leading to a linear time complexity with respect to the number of queries and the initial array size.
